N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 540.5 - Unescorted furlough

State Regulations
(a) Unescorted
furlough may not be granted to any patient who is currently subject to a
temporary order of observation, an order of commitment or an order of
retention. (b) Unescorted furlough
may be granted by the clinical director to a patient retained as a civil
patient after the expiration of an order issued under article 730 of the

Criminal Procedure Law, after consultation with the hospital forensic committee
as required in section
540.9
of this Part and compliance
with the notice requirements described in section
540.10
of this Part. Notes
